description: Provides a list of analysis segments for a real-time chat analysis session. This API supports CHAT channels only.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: The identifier of the contact in this instance of Amazon Connect.

parameters.name: OutputType
parameters.description: The Contact Lens output type to be returned.

parameters.name: SegmentTypes
parameters.description: Enum with segment types . Each value corresponds to a segment type returned in the segments list of the API. Each segment type has its own structure. Different channels may have different sets of supported segment types. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Channel
nested_items.description: The channel of the contact.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of real-time contact analysis.

nested_items.name: Segments
nested_items.description: An analyzed transcript or category.

nested_items.name: Transcript
nested_items.description: The analyzed transcript segment.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the transcript.

nested_items.name: ParticipantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the participant.

nested_items.name: ParticipantRole
nested_items.description: The role of the participant. For example, is it a customer, agent, or system.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the participant.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the transcript. Can be redacted.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: The type of content of the item. For example, text/plain.

nested_items.name: AbsoluteTime
nested_items.description: Time represented in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2019-11-08T02:41:28.172Z.

nested_items.name: Redaction
nested_items.description: Object describing redaction that was applied to the transcript. If transcript has the field it means part of the transcript was redacted.

nested_items.name: CharacterOffsets
nested_items.description: List of character intervals each describing a part of the text that was redacted. For OutputType.Raw, part of the original text that contains data that can be redacted. For OutputType.Redacted, part of the string with redaction tag.

nested_items.name: BeginOffsetChar
nested_items.description: The beginning of the character interval.

nested_items.name: EndOffsetChar
nested_items.description: The end of the character interval.

nested_items.name: Sentiment
nested_items.description: The sentiment detected for this piece of transcript.

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: The matched category rules.

nested_items.name: MatchedDetails
nested_items.description: Map between the name of the matched rule and RealTimeContactAnalysisCategoryDetails.

nested_items.name: PointsOfInterest
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: PointsOfInterest
nested_items.description: List of PointOfInterest - objects describing a single match of a rule.

nested_items.name: TranscriptItems
nested_items.description: List of the transcript items (segments) that are associated with a given point of interest.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: Transcript identifier. Matches the identifier from one of the TranscriptSegments.

nested_items.name: CharacterOffsets
nested_items.description: List of character intervals within transcript content/text.

nested_items.name: BeginOffsetChar
nested_items.description: The beginning of the character interval.

nested_items.name: EndOffsetChar
nested_items.description: The end of the character interval.

nested_items.name: IssuesDetected
nested_items.description: List of the issues detected.

nested_items.name: TranscriptItems
nested_items.description: List of the transcript items (segments) that are associated with a given issue.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: Part of the transcript content that contains identified issue. Can be redacted.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: Transcript identifier. Matches the identifier from one of the TranscriptSegments.

nested_items.name: CharacterOffsets
nested_items.description: Begin and end offsets for a part of text.

nested_items.name: BeginOffsetChar
nested_items.description: The beginning of the character interval.

nested_items.name: EndOffsetChar
nested_items.description: The end of the character interval.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the contact event.

nested_items.name: ParticipantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the participant.

nested_items.name: ParticipantRole
nested_items.description: The role of the participant. For example, is it a customer, agent, or system.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the participant. Can be redacted.

nested_items.name: EventType
nested_items.description: Type of the event. For example, application/vnd.amazonaws.connect.event.participant.left.

nested_items.name: AbsoluteTime
nested_items.description: Time represented in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2019-11-08T02:41:28.172Z.

nested_items.name: Attachments
nested_items.description: The analyzed attachments.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the segment.

nested_items.name: ParticipantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the participant.

nested_items.name: ParticipantRole
nested_items.description: The role of the participant. For example, is it a customer, agent, or system.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the participant. Can be redacted.

nested_items.name: Attachments
nested_items.description: List of objects describing an individual attachment.

nested_items.name: AttachmentName
nested_items.description: A case-sensitive name of the attachment being uploaded. Can be redacted.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: Describes the MIME file type of the attachment. For a list of supported file types, see Feature specifications in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

nested_items.name: AttachmentId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the attachment.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the attachment.

nested_items.name: AbsoluteTime
nested_items.description: Time represented in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2019-11-08T02:41:28.172Z.

nested_items.name: PostContactSummary
nested_items.description: Information about the post-contact summary.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the summary.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Whether the summary was successfully COMPLETED or FAILED to be generated.

nested_items.name: FailureCode
nested_items.description: If the summary failed to be generated, one of the following failure codes occurs:
QUOTA_EXCEEDED: The number of concurrent analytics jobs reached your service quota.
INSUFFICIENT_CONVERSATION_CONTENT: The conversation needs to have at least one turn from both the participants in order to generate the summary.
FAILED_SAFETY_GUIDELINES: The generated summary cannot be provided because it failed to meet system safety guidelines.
INVALID_ANALYSIS_CONFIGURATION: This code occurs when, for example, you're using a language that isn't supported by generative AI-powered post-contact summaries.
INTERNAL_ERROR: Internal system error.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
